divs: Sighting DetailsI live here in Ocean View on the Big Island and saw the red "Light" ..... it was around 9 pm .... It wasn't a flare nor any type of fireworks.... It stayed in one place...not moving.... at about 30 to 35 degrees in the sky ...I viewed through my trees! Unfortunately, I ran in the house to get my zoom lense on the camera....and POOF!! it was gone. I'm so happy to hear someone else on the island saw it too!!! Mahalo
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ocean View
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 4th of July over South Point on Big Island Hawaii....
